### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery, and offloading of fresh bread, rolls, and miscellaneous bakery products on an as-and-when-requested basis for various government departments in the Atlantic Region. The successful bidder is responsible for supplying fresh products according to the required specifications.

For more information, please refer to the notice URL above. Parties interested in submitting a tender should review the notice in its entirety and contact the contracting entity or the bidder address listed above for further information. Sorry, but no attachments or other document have been included with this tender due to its expired status.
